Introducing Match Score, the essential app for every football enthusiast. With Match Score, you can stay effortlessly connected to the world of football, accessing a wealth of information right at your fingertips. From match schedules to results, Match Score ensures you're always in the loop.

Key Features:


Upcoming Matches & Results:
Never miss a game again! Match Score provides a comprehensive schedule of all upcoming matches, allowing you to plan your viewing in advance. Additionally, you can easily check the results of past matches, keeping you up to date with the latest developments in the football world.

Favorites:
Track your favorite teams and matches with ease. Match Score's Favorites feature lets you select the teams and matches that matter most to you. Receive real-time notifications when these matches are about to start, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action.

Predictions:
Enhance your game-day experience with expert insights and predictions. Match Score offers detailed analysis and predictions for today's matches, helping you stay informed and engaged. Whether you're a casual fan or a seasoned follower, these predictions add an extra layer of excitement to your football experience.

Stay effortlessly connected to the football world with Match Score. Download the app today and make it your go-to source for all football updates and information.

app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

A PLAY Games é uma publicação mensal que concentra - há mais de dez anos - as maiores novidades, lançamentos, análises, dicas e curiosidades deste segmento. Sua especialidade são detonados, roteiros completos e minuciosos dos jogos mais populares da geração PlayStation.

Faça o download grátis da PLAY Games e compre edições avulsas ou assine diretamente do seu iPad, iPhone ou iPod Touch. 

• Assinatura auto-renovável PlayStation - Revista Oficial 

• Duração da assinatura e quantidade de edições enviadas durante a assinatura: 
• Assinatura de 1 ano (1 year subscription) – 12 edições 
• Assinatura de 6 meses (6 months subscription) – 6 edições 
• Assinatura de 1 mês (1 month subscription) – 1 edição 

• Preço da assinatura auto-renovável e edições avulsas: 
• Assinatura de 1 ano - Preço: US$ 30.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 6 meses - Preço: US$ 15.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 1 mês - Preço: US$ 2.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Edição avulsa – Preço: US$ 2.99 

• O pagamento será debitado da sua conta do iTunes no momento da confirmação da compra 

• A assinatura é renovada automaticamente a menos que a renovação automática seja cancelada pelo menos 24 horas antes do final do período vigente 

• A renovação da sua assinatura será cobrada no prazo de 24 horas antes do final do período vigente e identificada o custo da renovação 

• As assinaturas podem ser gerenciados pelo usuário e a auto-renovação pode ser cancelada. Isso pode ser feito nas configurações da conta do usuário após a compra 

• Nenhum cancelamento da assinatura atual é permitida durante o período de assinatura vigente 

• Por favor, encontre nossos Termos e Condições e Política de Privacidade em: http://www.europanet.com.br/privacidade/ios/ 


Caso você seja assinante da revista impressa, basta entrar no app com seu e-mail e código de assinante para acessar suas revistas digitais gratuitamente. 

Qualquer dúvida, entre em contato com a nosso suporte técnico pelo e-mail: suportedigital@europanet.com.br

Astroloji dünyasına açılan kapınız Twitburc ile günlük, haftalık ve aylık burç yorumlarınızı kolayca takip edin. Astrolog Zeynep Turan rehberliğinde özel yorumlar alarak hayatınızın her anında yol gösterici bir rehber edinin. Günlük yaşam tarzınızdan kariyerinize ve aşk hayatınıza kadar birçok konuda zengin içerikler sunan bu astroloji uygulaması, astroloji severlerin vazgeçilmezi haline geliyor.
Doğum Haritası Analizi: Doğum haritası, sizin kim olduğunuzu ve geleceğinizde sizi nelerin beklediğini gösterir. Bu uygulama, doğum haritası analizi ile sizin için özel olarak hazırlanmış raporlarla astrolojik haritanızı keşfetmenizi sağlar. Gezegenlerin yerleşimi, burçlarınız ve astrolojik etkiler hakkında kapsamlı bilgi edinerek kendinizi daha iyi tanıyın.
Astroloji Danışmanlığı: Ünlü astrologdan birebir danışmanlık hizmeti alarak sorularınıza yanıt bulun. Kariyer planlamasından ilişkilere kadar, astroloji danışmanlığı ile geleceğinizi daha net görmenizi sağlayacak rehberliğe ulaşın. Kendi doğum haritanızın detaylarını öğrenerek yaşamınızdaki olayların ardındaki astrolojik etkileri keşfedin.
Günlük Burç Yorumları: Her sabah burç yorumlarınızı okuyarak gününüzü planlayın. Günlük, haftalık ve aylık burç yorumlarıyla geleceğinize dair ipuçlarını yakalayın. Astroloji severler için özel olarak hazırlanmış yorumlarla her gün astroloji rehberiniz cebinizde olsun.
İlişki Uyumu Analizi: Uygulama, kişisel astroloji yorumlarının yanı sıra ilişkilerinizi de astrolojik açıdan analiz eder. İlişki uyumu analizi ile siz ve partnerinizin burç uyumunu keşfedin, aranızdaki enerjiyi ve gezegenlerin ilişkilerinize etkisini öğrenin. Doğum haritalarınızı karşılaştırarak aşk, arkadaşlık veya iş ilişkilerinizde uyumu artıracak öneriler alın; ilişkilerinizi daha iyi anlamak için astrolojinin rehberliğinden yararlanın.
Astro Podcast, Videolar ve Makaleler: Twitburc, günlük burç yorumları ve astroloji danışmanlık hizmetlerine ek olarak astrolojiye dair kapsamlı bilgiler sunar. Astro Podcast ile astrolojinin temel konularından güncel gökyüzü hareketlerine kadar geniş bir yelpazede bilgi edinin. Videolarla gezegenlerin etkileri, burç özellikleri, doğum haritası analizi ve astrolojik kavramları detaylı anlatımlarla keşfedin. Makaleler bölümünde ise astrolojinin derinliklerine inerek tüm merak ettiklerinize yanıt bulabilirsiniz. Bu zengin içeriklerle astroloji bilginizi derinleştirin.
Astro Öğren & Astro Blog: Astrolojiye ilgi duyanlar için hazırlanan Astro Öğren bölümü, gezegen hareketleri, burç özellikleri ve astrolojik kavramlar gibi konuları keşfetmenize olanak tanır. Yükselen burçlardan ay düğümlerine, gezegenlerin doğum haritasındaki yerleşimlerinden retro hareketlere kadar derinlemesine bilgiye ulaşın. Astro Blog ile güncel gökyüzü olayları, astrolojik analizler ve uzman yorumlarıyla astroloji bilginizi artırın ve kendinizi bu alanda geliştirin.
Premium Paketlerle Daha Fazla Ayrıcalık: Astrolojiye dair daha kapsamlı bilgi edinmek ve özel hizmetlerden yararlanmak isteyenler için premium paketler sunuyoruz. Kapsamlı doğum haritası analizleri, özel burç yorumları ve kişisel astroloji danışmanlığı gibi birçok ayrıcalığa erişim sağlayın. Daha fazlasını keşfetmek için premium üyelik seçeneklerimizi inceleyin.
Astroloji Bilgisine Doyun: Uygulama yalnızca burç yorumları ve danışmanlıkla sınırlı kalmaz; astrolojiye ve günlük yaşantınıza dair geniş bilgi sunar. Gezegenlerin etkileri ve astrolojik kavramlarla ilgili derinlemesine içerikler sayesinde astrolojinin gizemli dünyasına adım atın.
Twitburc, astroloji dünyasının kapılarını aralayarak astrolojik analizlerinizi sunan ve ünlü bir astrologdan danışmanlık almanızı sağlayan eşsiz bir platformdur. Doğum haritası analizi, astroloji danışmanlığı ve günlük burç yorumlarıyla astrolojinin rehberliğini cebinize taşıyın. Astrolojiye ilgi duyan herkes için vazgeçilmez bir bilgi kaynağı olan bu uygulamayı hemen indirin ve hayatınızı yıldızların rehberliğinde keşfetmeye başlayın!
https://twitburc.com.tr/kullanicisozlesmesi

RepairLog is your ultimate companion for keeping every repair and maintenance task in order. Whether it’s fixing a leaky faucet, painting a room, or replacing a window, the app helps you log every detail - from what was repaired to when, how much it cost, and who did the work. You can organize repairs by rooms or areas, attach notes and always have your home’s maintenance history at hand.

Planning future repairs is just as easy - simply set a date and RepairLog will remind you before the time comes, so you never forget an important task. You can also track your total spending and view clear statistics to understand where your budget goes. With a clean and intuitive interface, RepairLog makes it simple to stay on top of home care, reduce stress, and keep your space in perfect shape all year round.

Listen AI: Unveiling the Power of Text-to-Speech

Turn Text into Speech and Open Your Ears to the Written Word

Listen AI isn't just a text-to-speech tool, it's your effortless companion for a world of information, narrated at your pace. Here's how Listen AI elevates your experience:

Unmatched Vocal Majesty: Immerse yourself in a variety of crystal-clear, expressive voices that blur the line between human and machine. Choose from a range of accents and personalities to find the perfect narrator for any content, be it a casual blog post or a formal report.

Customization at Your Fingertips: Tailor your listening experience to your preferences. Adjust the speaking rate to match your comprehension speed, or fine-tune the volume for optimal comfort.

Effortless Integration: Forget copy-pasting. Listen AI seamlessly converts text from documents and web pages into spoken content. Highlight a passage on a website, a section in a PDF, or an entire document, and Listen AI will bring it to life with its captivating narration.

Multitasking Masterclass: Free up your eyes and ears for other activities. Listen to articles, web pages, and PDFs while you exercise, commute, cook, or complete chores. Listen AI lets you learn and stay informed while you conquer your to-do list.

Accessibility Champion: Listen AI is a game-changer for those with visual impairments or learning disabilities. Reading lengthy documents or educational materials can be a challenge. Listen AI transforms text into an engaging audio experience, making learning and information access more accessible than ever before.

Listen AI: It's not just reading, it's experiencing.

Terms and Conditions: https://static.listenai.app/terms-conditions-en.html
Privacy Policy: https://static.listenai.app/privacy-en.html
Community Guidelines: https://static.listenai.app/community-guidelines-en.html

Peech – Turn Anything Into Audiobooks!

Meet Peech, your personal AI-powered reading sidekick that transforms all your text - PDFs, web articles, physical books, and more - into crystal-clear audiobooks. Whether you’re racing through study notes, catching up on blog posts, or diving into that spicy new novel, Peech has you covered.

The Magic of AI Voices
	• Smart Voice Matching: Peech’s advanced AI picks the perfect voice for each genre - whether it’s serious academic reading or a lighthearted romance.
	• Natural & Lifelike: Our voices are so real, you might forget you’re listening to an app.

Effortless Content Scanning
	• Lightning-Fast OCR: Snap a pic of any page or book, and Peech instantly converts it to audio. No more manual typing!
	• Web & PDF Parsing: Just paste a link or upload a file to start listening - perfect for busy pros, students, and anyone who prefers ears over eyes.

Speedy Reading, On-the-Go
	• High-Speed Playback: Devour your favorite content up to 5x faster - perfect for power-learners or those who want to binge-listen on the run.
	• Playlists & Autoplay: Build custom playlists to keep the stories rolling, so you can multitask like a boss.

One App, All Languages
	• Automatic Language Detection: Peech seamlessly identifies and narrates in 60+ languages.
	• Global Accessibility: Great for language learners, busy professionals, and anyone with reading challenges.

Why Peech?
	• Students: Turn textbooks into engaging audio lectures - study smarter, not harder.
	• Busy Professionals: Catch up on news, memos, or trade articles during your commute.
	• Accessibility: An empowering reading solution for users with visual or reading impairments.
	• Content Lovers: From classics to your favorite steamy novels - Peech reads it all.

Free Trials & Subscriptions

Experience Peech with our flexible subscription plans, some offering free trials. Dive into unlimited content and see how Peech revolutionizes your reading routine - no commitment, no hassle.

Ready to transform your reading life? Give Peech a try and unlock the power of AI-driven audio today!

Listening is more ENJOYABLE and PRODUCTIVE than reading.
Text To Speech: Audio Books is an AI technology that enables to convert and read aloud any text as speech imitative of the human voice. This app transforms text, books, document, PDF and online articles into audiobooks. Now you can stay informed while cooking, driving, work out, doing sports, commute and let Text To Speech work as a text reader for you.

Text To Speech - Audiobooks is an essential tool for all kinds of reader, especially for those who are busy and want to enjoy audiobooks or people with dyslexia and other reading difficulties. The app is like an audible book, it can read aloud any text, webpages, PDF, eBooks or text book to you with our high quality natural sounding voices.

FEATURE LIST:
• Listen to articles, PDF, digital text, or physical books AS AUDIO.
• Listen with 50+ high quality natural human voices and 20+ languages.
• Listen at any speed you like, even faster or slower 5x than usual speed.
• Scan physical book pages with your device camera and convert to audible text.
• Import internet articles and online news straight from your mobile browser.
• Upload and convert photo, PDF and Docs file from iCloud, Google Drive, Dropbox.
• Listen to audible text with your iOS iPhone and iPad
• Organize listening files with library
• Support multiple languages: English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Japanese, Italian, Russian, Dutch, Finnish, Swedish, Danish, Turkish, Polish, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Arabic, Hindi, Korean, Thai.


I. LISTEN TO ANY TEXT - IN ANYWHERE - AT ANYTIME:
Import PDF, photo of physical book pages, document, online articles, web pages or insert clipboard-copied text and let Text To Speech read aloud text to you in the natural human voice. Don't read anymore! Let's listen to your text!

II. +50 VOICES FOR BOTH MAN AND WOMEN, SUPPORTED 20 LANGUAGES:
Text To Speech provides more 50 high quality human voice across 20 languages. Just pick your favourite voice and find the perfect reading speed that works for you.

III. READ FASTER, REMEMBER LONGER
Text To Speech helps highlight each word as it reads. Listening and reading at the same time can maximize the levels of comprehension and help the reader remember longer than usual.

IV. SOLUTION FOR USERS WITH READING DYSLEXIA:
Text To Speech is a perfect solution for users with Dyslexia, ADHD, Low vision acuity, anxiety, concussions, and other reading disabilities to breeze through their readings and engage with their curiosities.


With Text To Speech : Audio Books, you can save time, retain more information, and stay focused. No matter what kind of reader you are, experience more with Text To Speech - Natural Reader.

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTIONS:

• Subscribed user can get access to Text To Speech Premium natural reading voices with unlimited uses.

• User can subscribe for one month (USD 19.99$) and one year (USD 99.99$) auto-renewing subscription.

• Unsubscribed users can only use those services with a limited quota per day.

• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase

• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period

• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal

• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase

• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.


Terms of Use: http://vulcanlabs.co/terms-of-use/

Privacy Policy: http://vulcanlabs.co/privacy-policy/

You are welcome to contact us at support@vulcanlabs.co

Football live score brings you the latest results from the world of football. Stay updated with live games, events, fixtures, standings, and top scorers all in one convenient app.

Follow the action closely with real-time push notifications for every event during a game. Experience the exclusive feature of receiving live game events in your favorite messaging app. Try it out and enhance your football live action!

Enjoy Football live score on multiple platforms including iOS, web, Mac OS, and across all your devices - desktop, phone, or tablet.

### Main leagues and teams
Access comprehensive information from 700+ leagues worldwide, including the World Cup, Premier League, Champions League, the Championship, EFL, National League, non-league, Scottish Premier League, FA Women's Super League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Ligue 1, Liga MX, Euros, Eredivisie, FA Cup, UEFA Nations League, and many more.

### Fixtures, calendars, standings, and top scorers
Effortlessly browse past and upcoming games in the calendar, with detailed information such as start time, location, referee, and lineups. Get in-depth league info with standings and top scorers.

### Team pages and advanced player stats
Explore team pages featuring lineups, leagues, and the latest games. Stay updated on top teams like PSG, Real Madrid, Barcelona, Manchester United, Chelsea, Liverpool, AC Milan, Bayern Munich, and more. Delve into advanced player stats for stars like Kylian Mbappe, Lionel Messi, Neymar, Cristiano Ronaldo, Erling Haaland, and Karim Benzema. Receive live event notifications involving your favorite players.

### Personalize your user experience
Customize your favorites by adding leagues, teams, or players. The app's user interface adapts to make it easier for you to follow their results.

### Live notifications of events
Receive real-time push notifications for various events including game starts and ends, halftime updates, goals, cards, and substitutions.

### Exclusive feature (FREE FOR NOW)
Engage your chat community with powerful integrations of live events to Twitter, Discord, Telegram, or Slack. Personalize event messages to create a fun and entertaining experience in your Slack channel. Take it further and set up your own webhooks to integrate live events wherever you desire.

Please note: The names and logos of teams in this application are used for identification purposes only and do not imply endorsement or association with the EPL or any EPL club.

developer: Dow Jones & Company, Inc., publisher of The Wall Street Journal.
description:
WALL STREET JOURNAL (iOS) 

Download the WSJ App Today

Staying ahead of the competition means staying up to date with the facts. Get the trusted insights, in-depth analysis and real-time updates you need from the WSJ App.

Download the app today and subscribe to receive instant access to WSJ’s unrivaled journalism covering today’s top stories across finance, politics, business, tech, the economy and more. Enjoy exclusive newsletters and videos that dive deeper into the stories that matter.

Key benefits include:

Customizable App Experience 
(+) Follow your your favorite WSJ journalists
(+) Access interactive charts to follow the latest market trends
